title: Nordic-Inspired Family Retreat in Historic Krosno
description: Discover calm, simplicity, and natural light in this beautifully crafted, minimalist Scandinavian-style house with three generous bedrooms and three modern bathrooms. Spread over 160 sqm, clean lines and subtle hues create an inviting interior suited for contemporary living. The open-concept design maximizes space for family moments and quiet retreats alike. High-performance soundproof walls combine privacy and peace, while well-maintained gardens encourage play or unwinding outside.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in Krosno’s enchanting Old Town, your home connects to history while embracing a future-focused, tech-oriented spirit. Experience days filled with the vibrancy of cafes, markets, and community…all encapsulated by a peaceful, low-urban neighborhood feel and the convenience of highway access.
target_buyer: Ideal for families craving balanced living—ample room for children, a peaceful workspace for adults, and neighborhood amenities inspiring connection and learning.
market_positioning: In Krosno’s leafy Old Town, this residence blends understated luxury, privacy, and practicality. Standing out with minimalist design, quality amenities, and suitability for modern families, it is a rarity among the town’s classical homes.
